Plot: In rural Indiana, Noah and his impoverished family wrestle with the mysterious return of his now mute sister Lauren, who was kidnapped and held captive for over a decade.
Title: Sand Castles
Writer: Jordon Hodges (screenplay), Jordon Hodges (story), Bugs Moran (story)
Actors: Jordon Hodges, Anne Winters, Randy Spence, Saxon Trainor
